content.text: It's nice to meet you, Amy. My name is participant_1.
Nice to meet you too, participant_2. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to chat with my friends, cook, and eat food. I also love kids and dogs.
That's great! I like to play tennis, bake, and watch TV. I also have two sisters and my mother is a dentist.
I've never played tennis, but I love watching it. I've also never baked, but I'm sure it would be fun to try. I love all kinds of TV shows, but my favorite is probably Silicon Valley.
I love Silicon Valley too! It's so funny and smart. I'm also a big fan of The Office and Friends.
Those are both great shows! I'm also a fan of The Big Bang Theory and Parks and Recreation.
I love all of those shows! I'm also a big fan of Seinfeld and The Simpsons.
Those are two of my favorite shows too! I love how they can make me laugh no matter how many times I watch them.
Me too! I could watch them all day long.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar taste in TV shows.
Me too! I think we're going to get along great.
